description: These Mexican-inspired burgers are a low-fat alternative to the usual beef burgers. The avocado cream makes a tasty replacement for commercially made ketchup or mayonnaise.
keywords: Spicy Turkey Burgers With Avocado Cream
name: Spicy Turkey Burgers With Avocado Cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Assemble the burgers by placing the cooked patties in the buns, along with as many fillings as you like, and add a spoonful of avocado cream on top.
